title: Thursday Post Show (01-20-22)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (01-20-22)
description:
Bobby starts sharing things that happened on this day in country music history. Amy says she found out her daughter’s dance is Western themed. She also reveals about her daughter starting to wear makeup. We got an update from Phone Screener Abby about recording her national anthem and why Raymundo hired her to sing on a song. Amy gives her thoughts on Katie Couric’s new book that she is currently reading.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby starts sharing things that happened on this day in country music history. Amy says she found out her daughter’s dance is Western themed. Amy gives her thoughts on Katie Couric’s new book that she is currently reading.
